files.package.json:
{
  "name": "balanced-match",
  "description": "Match balanced character pairs, like \"{\" and \"}\"",
  "version": "1.0.2",
  "repository": {
    "type": "git",
    "url": "git://github.com/juliangruber/balanced-match.git"
  },
  "homepage": "https://github.com/juliangruber/balanced-match",
  "main": "index.js",
  "scripts": {
    "test": "tape test/test.js",
    "bench": "matcha test/bench.js"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "matcha": "^0.7.0",
    "tape": "^4.6.0"
  },
  "keywords": [
    "match",
    "regexp",
    "test",
    "balanced",
    "parse"
  ],
  "author": {
    "name": "Julian Gruber",
    "email": "mail@juliangruber.com",
    "url": "http://juliangruber.com"
  },
  "license": "MIT",
  "testling": {
    "files": "test/*.js",
    "browsers": [
      "ie/8..latest",
      "firefox/20..latest",
      "firefox/nightly",
      "chrome/25..latest",
      "chrome/canary",
      "opera/12..latest",
      "opera/next",
      "safari/5.1..latest",
      "ipad/6.0..latest",
      "iphone/6.0..latest",
      "android-browser/4.2..latest"
    ]
  }
}
